comment._content: Mayor Gaynor of New York City

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: lifeas daddy: Thanks for the information about Gaynor.  There are many other photos of Gaynor in the Bain Collection.  We will add the information to the description when we update the database.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: If this was taken on September 6, 1913, it shows Mayor Gaynor's shipboard embarkation for a voyage to Europe. He died just six days later, while seated comfortably in a deck chair during the Atlantic crossing. Wikipedia on Mayor Gaynor: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/William_Jay_Gaynor
